name: Full Circle (itch) (Conmod)
description:
Welcome to Full Circle, we hope you enjoy your stay.

Events planned for the duration of your visit:

  • Green bullets! Use these to shoot those who oppose you.
  • Ferocious enemies! Now available in Melee & Ranged.
  • Toggleable torch! Use sparingly to aid your navigation.
  • Brand new pick-ups! Health, Ammo and Batteries.

Bullet-driven maze exploration like you've never seen it before. Take a trip to Full Circle. The squares await.

Controls:

'P' = Pause
'W' = Move Forward
'A' = Move Left
'S' = Move Backwards
'D' = Move Right
Move Cursor = Aim to shoot
Mouse Left Click = Shoot
Mouse Right Click = Toggle Torch

Notes:

Project produced in Unity 2019.2.19f1

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/AmdALRCWZxCeZvhS8

Thank you and we hope you have fun playing.
We had a lot of fun making it ! - TSE Team 12
